      • list

        @RequestMapping(value="/list",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public java.lang.String list(@RequestParam(name="start",defaultValue="0")
                                                                                                                                     int start,
                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(name="length",defaultValue="-1")
                                                                                                                                     int length,
                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(name="orderField",defaultValue="name")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String orderField,
                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(name="orderDir",defaultValue="ASC")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String orderDir)
        Returns JSON list of Tags
        Parameters:
        start - index of first item
        length - number of items to return
        orderField - field to order results by
        orderDir - order direction (ASC or DESC)
        Returns:
        JSON array of results
